title: When I take photos, my Pixel 2XL gives names photos not in the right order. What to do?
content:
When I take photos, my Pixel 2 XL gives names to photos not in the real order. After about 10 pictures, it automatically changes first two letters of photos. It results incorrect order when I see my photos. It is very annoying.
What can I do to get photos in the right (real) order?
